name: Fun Run Race 3D: Aquapark
description:
Fun Run Race 3D is an AquaPark Road Runner 3D Twisty free racing game with Music.

In the Course Player needs to Compete against other players for a real parkour experience Using multiple Fun Run 3D Race characters.

Jump from Tower to wall, climb Colorful ropes, swipe and Run faster, Swing in the Maze jump higher, grab to Rotate, use bars to keep from falling out and Escape from hole.

Never stop the Music Run Race!

score and get the best ranking by beating your opponents. You can also customize your character.and have fun with color painted worlds so Bump it and reach the Cross line First.
